alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 12:22PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Lander, south central Elko and northwestern Eureka Counties through 1245 PM PDT... At 1221 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 8 miles north of Carlin, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elko, Carlin, South Fork, Emigrant Pass, Dunphy, Beowawe, Palisade, Adobe Summit, North Area Mine, Emigrant Mine and South Area Mine. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
